ValidationRule.description: Only account owners associated with the account can create opportunities. EXCEPT Frontier System Administrator #CTF Customer Service Analyst #CTF Small Business User #CTF Small Business Manager #Federal & E-Rate Manager Frontier Auditor & Others
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW() , Account.RecordTypeId = "012E0000000fDc3", Account.OwnerId <> OwnerId,
Account.Territory_Name__c <> "",
$User.ProfileId <> "00e40000000nYck", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A89e", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A84o", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000f2Rg", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A5vO", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE000000126tW", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001267F", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A7yi", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000j9TV", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0h000001WfYf", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000aiCA", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000Qtux", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000j98B", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A8C8", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A5nM", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L0000012AB2", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A79m", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0h000001jDJj", $User.ProfileId <> "00eE0000001A7Lj", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0h000001WfvO", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0h000001WfYQ", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0h0000019Qd7", $User.ProfileId <> "00e0L000000ai4B", $User.ProfileId <> "00e8a000001rtkY"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only account owners associated with the account can create opportunities.
